QuestData.Title: A Rare and Unusual Spirit
QuestData.Description:
I awaken. I exist once more. And yet...
There is an emptiness within. A lingering tether to a home that no longer exists. So much wonder... so much splendor... lost.
Now I have no purpose. No fate. No path.
Will you teach me of this place, awakener? I sense there is much to be understood. Many secrets. Many truths.
In so doing, perhaps a new fate will emerge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Falir and bring them essences from the realms of the Shadowlands.
QuestData.RewardText:
Perhaps a new purpose awaits me.
You have rekindled my curiosity, at least.
